hero.description: Frontend Developer with one year of commercial experience. I am in love with React and passionate about learning new technologies.

about.I-can: If you need an adaptive cross-browser website - feel free to contact me. My stack of technologies includes HTML, CSS (SASS), JS, Yii2, Bootstrap, Angular and React.

resume.graduated: I am a bachelor in Cybersecurity, graduated from V.N.Karazin Kharkiv National University. I have one year of commercial experience in Frontend development.
resume.prevJob1: Collaborated on projects involving Yii2 and Angular frameworks
resume.prevJob2: Revitalized legacy projects through integration of modern technologies.
resume.prevJob3: Transformed designs into responsive layouts for optimal user experience.
resume.prevJob4: Enhanced existing functionalities to achieve higher performance standards.
resume.prevJob5: Developed a modular, multiple-page website in Angular that incorporated responsive design principles.

portfolio.descQ: Quizzical gets 5 questions from the Trivia API. You can select one of 5 answers. After they are checked you can see your score. Try your best to get 5/5!
portfolio.descB: This is a catalog website for a Ukrainian library in Łódź. It has  many interesting features, such as word and author search (with error tolerance), category search, and more. Additionally, there is an admin panel for the library owner, where she can add, delete, or edit books.
portfolio.descM: It was a final project for the course 'Advanced React' from Meta. The aim was to show up the React skills. I am the most proud of implementing the form.
portfolio.descG: It is a website with three different games written with vanilla js. You can play Wordle, Breakout and Tetris!
portfolio.descP: It was a website-portfolio which aim was to demonstrate my skills as well as previous projects. My favourite features are language detection, image gallery and contact form.
portfolio.descT: It's a website for an eSports tournament. Interesting features: side navigation menu, data from the database (Firebase) to ensure the possibility of changing information about the tournament at any time.
portfolio.descMD:
It's a website for Medicine delivery system. For website I used MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS). There is an opportunity to log in (use 'admin' for both login and password to test).
You can add items to favourites, search for items or add to cart.
P.S. Due to the free version of hosting, first load may take up to 1 minute
portfolio.aboutMD: A fullstack application for Medicine delivery system
portfolio.descFem: I redesigned the website following modern design principles: improved contrast, enhanced readability, optimized structure, and refined the overall visual appeal. Now it looks modern, professional, and user-friendly.
portfolio.descPH:
A sleek and modern website for a photographer.
Features:
- Clean, minimalistic design
- Online payment integration
- Optimized UI/UX for a seamless experience
portfolio.aboutPH: A professional portfolio website for a photographer
